messages.message: Component definition is missing display name
React Hook useLayoutEffect has a missing dependency: 'buildTl'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [buildTl, ease, items]

messages.message: Expected an assignment or function call and instead saw an expression.

Using `` could result in slower LCP and higher bandwidth. Consider using `` from `next/image` or a custom image loader to automatically optimize images. This may incur additional usage or cost from your provider. See: https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/no-img-element

React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'frequency', 'mouseInfluence', 'noise', 'parallax', 'scale', 'speed', 'transparent', and 'warpStrength'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [frequency, mouseInfluence, noise, parallax, scale, speed, transparent, warpStrength]

fix.text: [frequency, mouseInfluence, noise, parallax, scale, speed, transparent, warpStrength]

suppressedMessages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.
